text: Motion
Motion
Stylist
Director
Today, I look forward to working with you.

Thank you, I look forward to working with you too.
It's been a while, Mikoto-chan!
Yeah, it has been a while.

Mikoto-chan, it's been since the last special
program, right? Your skin is still beautiful as ever.

I'm going to give it my all this time,
so please wait a moment~
...Yeah, thank you.
Good morning~!
Good morning.

Last time's program received good
reviews, Mikoto-san!
Thank you very much.

With your stability, Mikoto-san, I feel at ease.
Let's have a great day today too!
Yes, please take care of me.

It seems like you know not only the
makeup artist but also the director...

Mikoto,
have you known the director for a long time?
...The director?

Ah, it seems like I've known
the stylist for a while too...

We've worked together a few times back
when I was at my previous agency.

I see,
so it's a relationship from your previous agency...

The person who did my makeup has also
been helpful to me several times.
I see...

Mikoto isn't new to 283 Production,
so it's natural for her to have many acquaintances.

You're truly experienced in the industry,
more professional than me.
...Do you think so?
After ten years in this industry...

(Hmm, Mikoto doesn't seem to think much
about her career itself being impressive.)
(From my perspective, she's quite reliable though...)

It's a plus to have many acquaintances in this industry.
And Mikoto has a good reputation too.

Those are essential elements for an idol.
You should have more confidence, don't you think?
Essential elements for an idol...

Ah, it's also about being remembered
and having many acquaintances...
I think those are important for an idol.

It's also because you've handled so many jobs.
It shows that Mikoto is recognized.
...I see, that might be true...

...Then, from now on,
as Mikoto Aketa  from 283Pro.

As the idol I aspire to be,
I'd like to introduce myself...
I see...
Yeah, that's right, Mikoto is our idol.

I'll also work harder to make myself more
memorable, so let's work hard together!
...Yeah.
Thank you, Producer.
